343    public CustomLineItem build() {
344        Objects.requireNonNull(id, CustomLineItem.class + ": id is missing");
345        Objects.requireNonNull(name, CustomLineItem.class + ": name is missing");
346        Objects.requireNonNull(money, CustomLineItem.class + ": money is missing");
347        Objects.requireNonNull(totalPrice, CustomLineItem.class + ": totalPrice is missing");
348        Objects.requireNonNull(slug, CustomLineItem.class + ": slug is missing");
349        Objects.requireNonNull(quantity, CustomLineItem.class + ": quantity is missing");
350        Objects.requireNonNull(state, CustomLineItem.class + ": state is missing");
351        Objects.requireNonNull(discountedPricePerQuantity,
352            CustomLineItem.class + ": discountedPricePerQuantity is missing");
353        return new CustomLineItemImpl(id, name, money, taxedPrice, totalPrice, slug, quantity, state, taxCategory,
354            taxRate, discountedPricePerQuantity, custom, shippingDetails);

369    public static CustomLineItemBuilder of(final CustomLineItem template) {
370        CustomLineItemBuilder builder = new CustomLineItemBuilder();
371        builder.id = template.getId();
372        builder.name = template.getName();
373        builder.money = template.getMoney();
374        builder.taxedPrice = template.getTaxedPrice();
375        builder.totalPrice = template.getTotalPrice();
376        builder.slug = template.getSlug();
377        builder.quantity = template.getQuantity();
378        builder.state = template.getState();
379        builder.taxCategory = template.getTaxCategory();
380        builder.taxRate = template.getTaxRate();
381        builder.discountedPricePerQuantity = template.getDiscountedPricePerQuantity();
382        builder.custom = template.getCustom();
383        builder.shippingDetails = template.getShippingDetails();
